TopicTitle: EVA-11 fuel canister does not give extra fuel

Articles.Content: I have a Kerbal equipped with EVA-11 fuel canister but I cannot get my Kerbal to have anymore than 5 units of propellant.  Version 1.12.2.3167 for Mac with KAS and KIS for mods, compatible with this version. Earlier versions of game did not have this issue. Thanks in advance.
